attributes.action: Jail Sexual Perverts whom stalk Public Places that Children And Youths Meet
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Sexual predators are known to prowl cinemas,public parks,sport centres,libraries,shopping centres and even a public toilet to snare vulnerable children and youths.
Some are like wolves offering a young lad £10 for a kiss or paying to accompany them into a darkened cinema in the pretext of Friendship.
Pity the poor boys and girls whom fall for these perverts.
Place Photographs of these predators in the public places as a Warning to Children and Youths.
